CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.8f.1, patientindicationmeddraversion (8AN) E2B (R2): B.1.10.8f.1, parentdrgindicationmeddraversion (8AN)
E2B (R3): D.8.r.6a MedDRA Version for Indication E2B (R3): D.10.8.r.6a MedDRA Version for Indication Conformance: Optional, but required if D.10.8.r.6b is populated. Data Type: 4AN OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric and ‘. ‘(dot)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If applicable, MedDRA terms should be used in the indication.
CustomField.label: MedDRA Version for Indication
